00012 /**
00013  * locale-component. reads and caches an phpfile with language-strings
00014  * components are lightweight supportclasses for controllers
00015  * @package kata
00016  */
00017 
00018 /**
00019  * global variable to cache the locale-class
00020  * @global object $GLOBALS['__cachedLocaleComponent']
00021  * @name __cachedLocaleComponent
00022  */
00023 $GLOBALS['__cachedLocaleComponent']= null;
00024 /**
00025  * global function used to access language-strings
00026  * @param string $msgId name of the language-string to return
00027  * @param array $msgArgs any parameters for printf if you have
00028  * @return string
00029  */
00030 function __($msgId, $msgArgs= NULL) {
00031              if (null == $GLOBALS['__cachedLocaleComponent']) {
00032                           $GLOBALS['__cachedLocaleComponent']= classRegistry :: getObject('LocaleComponent');
00033              }
00034              return $GLOBALS['__cachedLocaleComponent']->getString($msgId, $msgArgs);
00035 }
00036 
00037 /**
00038  * The Locale-Component Class
00039  * @package kata
00040  */
00041 class LocaleComponent {
00042              /**
00043               * placeholder for controller that owns this component
00044               * @var object
00045               */
00046              public $controller= false;
00047 
00048              /**
00049               * array of strings of component-names this component needs to function. null or false if none.
00050               * @var array
00051               */
00052              public $components= array ();
00053 
00054              /**
00055               * placeholder for all languages
00056               * @var array
00057               */
00058              private $acceptedLanguages= null;
00059 
00060              /**
00061               * which language-code is currently in use
00062               * @var string
00063               * @private
00064               */
00065              private $code= false;
00066 
00067              /**
00068               * the array with all locale-strings for the current language are cached here
00069               * @var mixed
00070               */
00071              private $messages= null;
00072 
00073              /**
00074               * called by controller after the component was instanciated first
00075               * @param object $controller the calling controller
00076               */
00077              public function startup(& $controller) {
00078                           $this->controller= $controller;
00079                           $this->setCode($this->findLanguage());
00080              }
00081 
00082              /**
00083               * return the translation for the given string-identifier
00084               * @param string $id identifier to look up translation
00085               * @param array $messageArgs optional parameters that will be formatted into the string with printf
00086               */
00087              function getString($id, $messageArgs= null) {
00088                           if (!$this->code) {
00089                                        throw new Exception('Locale: code not set yet');
00090                           }
00091                           if (empty ($this->messages)) {
00092                                        $this->getMessages();
00093                           }
00094 
00095                           if (!isset ($this->messages[$id])) {
00096                                        if (DEBUG > 0) {
00097                                                     throw new exception('locale: cant find "'.$id.'" in language '.$this->code);
00098                                        } else {
00099                                                     return '---UNSET('.$id.')---';
00100                                        }
00101                           }
00102                           $ret= $this->messages[$id];
00103 
00104                           if (defined('LANGUAGENOTPRINTF') && (LANGUAGENOTPRINTF)) {
00105                                        $replaced= 0;
00106                                        if (!empty ($messageArgs)) {
00107                                                     foreach ($messageArgs as $name => $value) {
00108                                                                  $ret= str_replace('%'.$name.'%', $value, $ret);
00109                                                                  $replaced++;
00110                                                     }
00111                                        }
00112                                        if ((DEBUG > 0) && ($replaced != count($messageArgs))) {
00113                                                     throw new Exception('locale: "'.$id.'" called with wrong number of arguments for language '.$this->code.' (i replaced:'.$replaced.' i was given:'.count($messageArgs).') key value is "'.$this->messages[$id].'"');
00114                                        }
00115                           } else {
00116                                        return vsprintf($ret, (null === $messageArgs?array():$messageArgs));
00117                           }
00118 
00119                           if (defined('CLICK2TRANSLATE') && (CLICK2TRANSLATE) && !empty($_GET['c2t'])) {
00120                                        $ret= '.<span class="c2t" ltlang=\''.$this->getCode().'\' ltname=\''.$id.'\'>'.$ret.'</span>';
00121                           }
00122                           return $ret;
00123              }
00124 
00125              /**
00126               * sets a language-code. writes the code into the session of the user
00127               * and sets Lang_Code for all views
00128               * @param string $code short iso-code for language ("de" "en" "fr")
00129               */
00130              function setCode($code) {
00131                           if (empty ($code)) {
00132                                        return;
00133                           }
00134 
00135                           if ($this->code != $code) {
00136                                        $this->messages= null;
00137 /*
00138                                        if (isset ($this->Session)) {
00139                                                     $this->Session->write('Lang.Code', $code);
00140                                        }
00141 */
00142                                        $this->code= $code;
00143                                        $this->controller->set('Lang_Code', $code);
00144                                        if (function_exists('setlocale')) {
00145                                                     setlocale(LC_ALL, $this->getLanguageFromTld($code));
00146                                        }
00147                           }
00148              }
00149 
00150              function getCode() {
00151                           return $this->code;
00152              }
00153 
00154              private function fillAcceptedLanguages() {
00155                           if ($this->acceptedLanguages !== null) {
00156                                        return;
00157                           }
00158 
00159                           $this->acceptedLanguages = array ();
00160                           if ($h= opendir(ROOT.'controllers'.DS.'lang'.DS)) {
00161                                        while (($file= readdir($h)) !== false) {
00162                                                     if ($file{0} == '.') {
00163                                                                  continue;
00164                                                     }
00165                                                     $temp= explode('.', $file);
00166                                                     if (isset($temp[1]) && ('php' == $temp[1])) {
00167                                                                  $this->acceptedLanguages[$temp[0]]= $temp[0];
00168                                                     }
00169                                        }
00170                                        closedir($h);
00171                           }
00172 
00173                           if (isset($this->acceptedLanguages['en'])) {
00174                                        unset($this->acceptedLanguages['en']);
00175                                        $this->acceptedLanguages['en'] = 'en';
00176                           }
00177 
00178                           if (isset($this->acceptedLanguages['de'])) {
00179                                        unset($this->acceptedLanguages['de']);
00180                                        $this->acceptedLanguages['de'] = 'de';
00181                           }
00182              }
00183 
00184              function doesLanguageExist($lang) {
00185                           $this->fillAcceptedLanguages();
00186                           return !empty($this->acceptedLanguages[$lang]);
00187              }
00188 
00189              function getAcceptedLanguages() {
00190                           $this->fillAcceptedLanguages();
00191                           return $this->acceptedLanguages;
00192              }
00193 
00194              /**
00195               * find the startup-language by looking at the LANGUAGE define in core/config.php
00196               */
00197              function findLanguage() {
00198                           if ((LANGUAGE == 'NULL') || (LANGUAGE === NULL)) {
00199                                        return null;
00200                           }
00201 /*
00202                           if (isset ($this->Session)) {
00203                                        $code= $this->Session->read('Lang.Code');
00204                                        if (isset ($code) && !empty ($code)) {
00205                                                     return $code;
00206                                        }
00207                           }
00208 */
00209                           if (LANGUAGE == 'VHOST') {
00210                                        $l = $this->getVhostLang();
00211                                        if (empty($l)) {
00212                                                     $l = $this->getBrowserLang();
00213                                        }
00214                                        return $l;
00215                           }
00216                           if (LANGUAGE == 'BROWSER') {
00217                                        return $this->getBrowserLang();
00218                           }
00219                           return LANGUAGE;
00220              }
00221 
00222              /**
00223               * try to find an language that we have as a file and that has a high priority in the users browser.
00224               * returns EN if anything fails
00225               * @return string short iso-code
00226               */
00227              function getBrowserLang() {
00228                           $this->fillAcceptedLanguages();
00229 
00230                           $wanted= env('HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE');
00231                           if (isset ($wanted)) {
00232                                        $Languages= explode(",", $wanted);
00233                                        $SLanguages= array ();
00234                                        foreach ($Languages as $Key => $Language) {
00235                                                     $Language= str_replace("-", "_", $Language);
00236                                                     $Language= explode(";", $Language);
00237                                                     if (isset ($Language[1])) {
00238                                                                  $Priority= explode("q=", $Language[1]);
00239                                                                  $Priority= $Priority[1];
00240                                                     } else {
00241                                                                  $Priority= "1.0";
00242                                                     }
00243                                                     $SLanguages[]= array (
00244                                                                  'priority' => $Priority,
00245                                                                  'language' => $Language[0]
00246                                                     );
00247                                        }
00248 
00249                                        foreach ($SLanguages as $key => $row) {
00250                                                     $priority[$key]= $row['priority'];
00251                                                     $language[$key]= $row['language'];
00252                                        }
00253 
00254                                        array_multisort($priority, SORT_DESC, $language, SORT_ASC, $SLanguages);
00255 
00256                                        $ALangString= implode(";", $this->acceptedLanguages);
00257                                        foreach ($SLanguages as $A) {
00258                                                     $key= array_search($A['language'], $this->acceptedLanguages);
00259                                                     if ($key === FALSE) {
00260                                                                  $GenericLanguage= explode("_", $A['language']);
00261                                                                  $pos1= strpos($ALangString, $GenericLanguage[0]);
00262                                                                  if (is_numeric($pos1)) {
00263                                                                               $key= $pos1 / 6;
00264                                                                  }
00265                                                     }
00266                                                     if (is_numeric($key) && (!isset ($Code))) {
00267                                                                  //$Code= $this->acceptedLanguages[$key];
00268                                                                  break;
00269                                                     }
00270                                        }
00271                           }
00272 
00273                           return !empty ($Code) ? $this->getTldFromLanguage($Code) : '';
00274              }
00275 
00276              /**
00277               * try to find an language that we have as a file depending on the current domain name
00278               * foo.example.tr -> "tr"
00279               * [foo.bar.]tr.example.com -> "tr"
00280               */
00281              function getVhostLang($useTld= false) {
00282                           $this->fillAcceptedLanguages();
00283 
00284                           $name= explode('.', env('SERVER_NAME'));
00285                           if (count($name) < 2) {
00286                                        return '';
00287                           }
00288 
00289                           foreach ($this->acceptedLanguages as & $lang) {
00290                                        // www.DE.example.com DE.example.com
00291                                        if (($name[0] == $lang) || ($name[1] == $lang)) {
00292                                                     return $this->getTldFromLanguage($lang);
00293                                        }
00294                                        if ($useTld) {
00295                                                     // www.example.DE
00296                                                     if (isset ($name[count($name) - 1]) && ($name[count($name) - 1] == $lang)) {
00297                                                                  return $this->getTldFromLanguage($lang);
00298                                                     }
00299                                        }
00300                           }
00301 
00302                           return '';
00303              }
00304 
00305              /**
00306               * return the array containing all locale-codes by reference
00307               */
00308              public function & getMessageArray() {
00309                           if (null === $this->messages) {
00310                                        $this->getMessages();
00311                           }
00312                           return $this->messages;
00313              }
00314 
00315              /**
00316               * load the message-array by loading controllers/lang/XX.php
00317               * tries to cache the array via APC (if loaded)
00318               */
00319              function getMessages() {
00320                           $pre= $this->code;
00321                           if (defined('CACHE_IDENTIFIER')) {
00322                                        $pre= CACHE_IDENTIFIER;
00323                           }
00324 
00325                           if (function_exists('apc_fetch') && (DEBUG < 1)) {
00326                                        $temp= apc_fetch($pre.'_lang_'.$this->code);
00327                                        if (false != $temp) {
00328                                                     $this->messages= & $temp;
00329                                                     return;
00330                                        }
00331                           } else {
00332                                        //TODO eaccellerator?
00333                           }
00334 
00335                           $messages= array ();
00336                           include (ROOT.'controllers'.DS.'lang'.DS.$this->code.'.php');
00337                           $this->messages= & $messages;
00338 
00339                           if (function_exists('apc_store') && (DEBUG < 1)) {
00340                                        apc_store($pre.'lang_'.$this->code, $this->messages, 300);
00341                           } else {
00342                                        //TODO eaccellerator
00343                           }
00344              }

00405              /**
00406               * map given language-tld-code to DINISO code for setLocale()
00407               * @param string language-code
00408               * @return string DINISO-code
00409               */
00410              private function getLanguageFromTld($lang) {
00411                           return empty ($this->tldToLanguageArr[$lang]) ? '' : $this->tldToLanguageArr[$lang];
00412              }
00413 
00414              /**
00415               * map given DINISO to language-tld-code code for setLocale()
00416               * @param string DINISO-code
00417               * @return string language-code
00418               */
00419              function getTldFromLanguage($langcode) {
00420                           $langcode= strtolower($langcode);
00421                           if (strlen($langcode) == 2) {
00422                                        foreach ($this->tldToLanguageArr as $tld => $code) {
00423                                                     if (substr($code, 0, 2) == $langcode) {
00424                                                                  return $tld;
00425                                                     }
00426                                        }
00427                           } else {
00428                                        foreach ($this->tldToLanguageArr as $tld => $code) {
00429                                                     if (strtolower($code) == $langcode) {
00430                                                                  return $tld;
00431                                                     }
00432                                        }
00433                           }
00434                           return '';
00435              }
